column2: PEDEVCO Corp. is an independent energy company. The company is headquartered in Houston, Texas and currently employs 14 full-time employees. The Companyâ€™s properties are located in the San Andres formation of the Permian Basin situated in West Texas and eastern New Mexico (the Permian Basin) and in the Denver-Julesberg Basin (D-J Basin) in Colorado. The firm holds approximately 40,200 net Permian Basin acres located in Chaves and Roosevelt Counties, New Mexico, and approximately 11,700 net D-J Basin acres located in Weld and Morgan Counties, Colorado, and holds interests in 359 gross (290 net) wells in the Permian Basin.
